title: Architecture for Flow with Wardley Mapping, DDD, and Team Topologies

media:group.media:title: Architecture for Flow with Wardley Mapping, DDD, and Team Topologies
media:group.media:description:
QCon Plus, the online software development conference organized by InfoQ, is returning this November 30 - December 8, with an international community of senior software engineers, architects, and team leaders joining. Donâ€™t miss your chance to be part of this event!

Save your spot now: https://bit.ly/3RvbhpN 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Video with transcript included:  https://bit.ly/3xzFHQv  

Susanne Kaiser illustrates the concepts of DDD, Wardley Mapping and Team Topologies, and demonstrates how these techniques help to evolve a fictitious legacy system for a fast flow of change.

This presentation was recorded at QCon Plus May 2022: https://plus.qconferences.com/
 
#WardleyMapping #DomainDrivenDesign #TeamTopologies
